name: Das Orb
description:
You are a magic orb that can cast spells by conjuring elemental orbs. Try out every spell and fight against the pointy polygons!

Right Click - Move
Left Click - Simple lightning spell

Q - Conjure Offensive Orb
W - Conjure Utility Orb
E - Conjure Defensive Orb
Space - Cast current Spell

Spell List

1Q - Meteor
2Q(1W/1E) - Laser
3Q - Meteor Shower

1W - Move Speed Buff
2W(1Q/1E) - Totem
3W - Global Time lock

1E - Shield
2E(1Q/1W) - Wall
3E - Nova
